dmca.title: [ABUSE] Piracy on your servers]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 06, 2005 1:33 PM
To: dgloba@tssupport.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Piracy on your servers]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Piracy on your servers
Date:         Fri, 6 May 2005 12:44:00 +0400
From:         Globa, Dennis <dgloba@tssupport.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Peter,

1. Your hosting is used for piracy software sales. Please terminate user
account and report to whom it concerns that http://master-trader.net
<http://master-trader.net/> illegally sale copyrighted software. I've found
our product (OwnData and OwnData 2) as well as other brands there (hundreds
of items). Please let me know as soon as possible.

2. What can we do to prevent capacity for work of http://master-trader.net
<http://master-trader.net/> web address in the future?

Dennis Globa
Principal

TS Support

www.tssupport.com
________________________________________________________________________
This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended
solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed.
If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager.
This communication is for information purposes only and should not be
regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any
financial product. Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or
error-free. Therefore, we do not represent that this information is complete
or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such. All information is
subject to change without notice.
________________________________________________________________________


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCe7hYvK/XpJs6oyURAgPNAKCJllHwNQ0nik4zESwUbn0KGH1s7QCeIc8v
dhkuqudtUzeztVa7grpBm94=
=rbIj
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
